thought.text: I'll help you implement the necessary changes to address the issue described. Let me start by understanding the problem and then work through each phase systematically.

task_list.title: Phase 1: Read and understand the problem
Phase 2: Set up environment and run tests
Phase 3: Explore codebase to find relevant files
Phase 5: Analyze the problem and solution

function.arguments: {"command": "plan", "security_risk": "LOW", "task_list": [{"title": "Phase 1: Read and understand the problem", "status": "todo"}, {"title": "Phase 2: Set up environment and run tests", "status": "todo"}, {"title": "Phase 3: Explore codebase to find relevant files", "status": "todo"}, {"title": "Phase 4: Create reproduction script", "status": "todo"}, {"title": "Phase 5: Analyze the problem and solution", "status": "todo"}, {"title": "Phase 6: Implement the fix", "status": "todo"}, {"title": "Phase 7: Verify the implementation", "status": "todo"}, {"title": "Phase 8: Final review and testing", "status": "todo"}]}
function.name: task_tracker
